body: This ammunition is specifically crafted from silver, and though nonmagical, it is particularly detrimental to lycanthropes, automatically confirming any critical threats against such creatures. A firearm that is shooting a silver bullet takes a –1 penalty on damage rolls (with a minimum of 1 point of damage).
name: Bullet, Silver
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Firearms/Firearm Descriptions/Firearm Ammunition and Adventuring Gear/Bullet/Silver
